title: A plea for simpler champions
body:
I am not saying this champions currently being released aren't fun interesting and strong... but could we get a few down to earth, easy and fair champions? We haven't had anything like garen or lux in quite a while. I would really like just a champion or two to be a no BS fair champion. Something pretty basic with a minor twist.

Q does damage
w does CC
e does mobility
r is unique to the champion and will probably be a highlight.

Why is that so hard? Not every champion needs two passives and a one of a kind (hard to balance) kit.

I get it isn't as flashy, but not everyone wants a ferrari, some people prefer the more subtle and reliable toyota camry....  (camry because it is one of the most high vol cars in NA, not because I like them:/)

Give me a solid, no BS champion Riot. I beg of you.
